channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP Asset Accounting
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP Asset Accounting

item.title: CVE-2024-27901|2024-09-06T18:01:25.580Z -- sap_se -- sap%20asset%20accounting
item.description: SAP Asset Accounting could allow a high privileged attacker to exploit insufficient validation of path information provided by the users and pass it through to the file API's. Thus, causing a considerable impact on confidentiality, integrity and availability of the application.
